text:
Excellent service By all 3 staff members who attended to my transaction in opening an Estate account. Being a  non Singaporean citizen,  there were extra verifications and it took almost  an hour or more for completion.
Special thanks to Mr Choo? And Samantha for displaying such a high level of  professionalism,  kudos to all

Denise was extremely helpful. The outlet was clearing it's last few customers for the day, yet she answered customer's many queries with friendliness. She also solves problems and understands needs quickly, making my banking experience at this outlet extremely enjoyable

Very inconvenient service by DBS in general. Just to add a name to my savings account I need to make an appointment personally at the branch & the next available appointment is the next day! Which means we have to go to the bank twice just for transactions. It’s crazy totally not acceptable. There’s also no way to make this appointment online or over the phone. Why do they have to make it so inconvenient for their clients?
So slow even on weekdays, half hour per customer. The Q number hardly move. Young ladies keep chatting among themselves.

it would be honestly 0 stars because of the service and how unfriendly one the staff was. I was just trying to explain to them my school told me when I asked about applying for DBS bank account said I really didn’t need a written letter for DBS and I could use other documents. The lady decided to cut me off when I spoke and spoke in a manner that was patronizing and mean, saying you will immediately fail the application. When I asked for clarification, she seemed extremely impatient
